Bastion Breach

Made by Andrew Kolos

You and the computer will play a round for each card in the middle, starting with the leftmost card.

The highest ranked card wins the round, getting the winner a point.

The ace is specialâ€”it beats any face card but loses to any number.

If neither of the player cards beats the other two cards, then the round ends in a tie. However, the next round will be worth an additional point (these can add up).
